caption: Small, fast visiting, beautiful gallery. Take 5 minutes, go check it out, you won't regret it.  Thanks, Perrotin!

Julian Charri√®re's exhibition "Panchronic Gardens" at Galerie Perrotin is a captivating experience that explores the interaction between nature and technology. The artist presents iconic works such as "And Beneath It All Flows Liquid Fire", a film depicting the coexistence of elements in a flaming fountain.  The exhibition offers a unique sensory experience and the opportunity to discover the work of this talented artist by diving into his universe which combines nature, technology and reflection on our future.

This is the gallery of art dealer Perrotin, and although it is a little far from the main building, it is a must-see place. This gallery provides the best environment for understanding the works of the carefully selected artists they introduce.
Magical place not to be missed in Paris
